about_the_game:
“You do not recognize the girl in the mirror…”

In Memories Not Found you take on the role of a girl who wakes up one day seemingly unable to remember who she is, with only a cryptic note left to guide her. Explore a variety of different worlds, fight unique enemies, and make friends with a quirky cast of characters all while trying to uncover the dark secrets of your past. However, not everyone you meet may be on your side. How far are you willing to go to remember who you are?

  • From a vast desert to a 24/7 dance party, explore more than a dozen different worlds.

  • Immerse yourself in a soundtrack and art style reminiscent of retro gaming classics

  • Help out those in need of assistance and make friends who will prove vital in figuring out the truth of what happened

  • Conquer the darker parts of your self as you learn more about your past

name: Memories Not Found

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 (32/64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel 4100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32/64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenEL 2.0 or hardware driver support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Travel through surreal worlds and make new friends while trying to unravel the secrets of your past…
